title: tour: Advances to next page when switching tabs with control-PageDown
body:
If I go to http://tour.golang.org/welcome/1 with Chrome 42.0.2311.68 on linux and hit control-PageDown control-PageUp to toggle tabs, the url has changed to http://tour.golang.org/list or http://tour.golang.org/welcome/1 (depending on direction of tab switch and whether I use the mouse or keyboard to return back to original tab).

Others have confirmed Chromium 41 does this, Firefox doesn't.
